testcase.classname: Verifying Login functionality with Valid & Invalid User Credentials
testcase.name: Verify that user is able to launch the application with valid url.
testcase.system-out: Given I want to launch chrome Brower........................................passed When I use valid URL of the Application in browser address bar..............passed Then User should be able to launch the application and login page should be displayed..passed And User closes the browser and application.................................passed

testcase.classname: Verifying Login functionality with Valid & Invalid User Credentials
testcase.name: Verify that user is able to login with Valid credentials.
testcase.system-out: Given Launch the application with valid URL.................................passed When Provide valid "standard_user" in username text box.....................passed And Provide valid "secret_sauce" in password textbox........................passed And Click on Login button...................................................passed Then User should be able to login into the application successfully.........passed And Products Page should be displayed.......................................passed Then Close the browser......................................................passed
